title: Introduction to Drunvalo Melchizedek
body:
We learn who Drunvalo Melchizedek is and how he received the knowledge he passes on in this Sacred Geometry workshop. For the first time, learn the ancient secret of the Flower of Life and how it can help human beings reach a higher self.
Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection. Discover how the Sacred Geometry of Mother Earth transcends our solar system, and how its life energy of cosmic cycles come full circle. Unlock the hidden secrets of the universe and human consciousness with the Flower of Life.
teaser: We learn who Drunvalo Melchizedek is and how he received the knowledge he passes on in this workshop.

title: The Earth's History
body:
From its depiction in ancient temples, we begin to unlock the secret of the flower of life and how it relates to the structure of the universe and the human soul.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: From its depiction in ancient temples, we begin to unlock the secret of the flower of life and how it relates to the structure of the universe and the human soul.

title: Thoth
body:
Thoth maybe thought of as humanity’s greatest teacher, and Drunvalo’s as well. Find out who Thoth was and why his teachings are so important for us all.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Thoth maybe thought of as humanity’s greatest teacher, and Drunvalo’s as well. Find out who Thoth was and why his teachings are so important for us all.

title: Secret of the Flower of Life
body:
From its depiction in ancient temples, we begin to unlock the secret of the flower of life and how it relates to the structure of the universe and the human soul.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.

title: Earth's Relation to the Cosmos
body:
Just as no man is an island, Earth is not alone in the vastness of the cosmos. Find out how our home planet relates to the rest of the universe.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Just as no man is an island, Earth is not alone in the vastness of the cosmos. Find out how our home planet relates to the rest of the universe.

title: Eras
body:
As our sun circumnavigates the center of the galaxy, civilizations on earth experience periods of falling asleep and awakening. Where are we now and what can we expect in the near future as we enter into a new era?           

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: As our sun circumnavigates the center of the galaxy, civilizations on earth experience periods of falling asleep and awakening. Where are we now and what can we expect in the near future as we enter into a new era?

title: Pole Shift Triggers
body:
Throughout the history of Earth, the magnetic poles have shifted, causing great disruptions for life on our planet. The great changes in our climate may be connected to another shift already in progress.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Throughout the history of Earth, the magnetic poles have shifted, causing great disruptions for life on our planet. The great changes in our climate may be connected to another shift already in progress.

title: History of the Earth Part 1
body:
Atlantis and Lemuria were two of the greatest civilizations, lost to time. But their knowledge and technology was at a level we have yet to reach.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Atlantis and Lemuria were two of the greatest civilizations, lost to time. But their knowledge and technology was at a level we have yet to reach.

title: History of the Earth Part 2
body:
Remnants of these ancient civilizations can be found in the remains of ancient Egypt. But the mysteries of the living Merkabah has survived the rise and fall of these civilizations.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Remnants of these ancient civilizations can be found in the remains of ancient Egypt. But the mysteries of the living Merkabah has survived the rise and fall of these civilizations.

title: Egypt's Role in the Evolution of Consciousness
body:
As inheritors of advanced spiritual knowledge, the priests and pharaohs of ancient Egypt played a pivotal role in the evolution of human consciousness. Traces of this knowledge can still be found in the forbidden ruins.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: As inheritors of advanced spiritual knowledge, the priests and pharaohs of ancient Egypt played a pivotal role in the evolution of human consciousness. Traces of this knowledge can still be found in the forbidden ruins.

title: Genesis History of Creation
body:
The secret to the “6 days of creation” are hidden within the seven interlocking circles of the seed of life. From these initial moments of creation to the mystery of Metatron’s cube can be found in the iterative patterns of the flower of life.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: The secret to the “6 days of creation” are hidden within the seven interlocking circles of the seed of life. From these initial moments of creation to the mystery of Metatron’s cube can be found in the iterative patterns of the flower of life.

title: Platonic Solids
body:
Building from the two dimensional visualization of the flower of life, we explore sacred geometry in three dimensions with the platonic solids.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Building from the two dimensional visualization of the flower of life, we explore sacred geometry in three dimensions with the platonic solids.

title: Geometry within the Human Body
body:
Geometry is found throughout all of nature, as evidenced by the golden means and the Fibonacci sequence. And that same sacred geometry can be found within the framework of the human body, as well.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Geometry is found throughout all of nature, as evidenced by the golden means and the Fibonacci sequence. And that same sacred geometry can be found within the framework of the human body, as well.

title: Geometries that Surround the Body
body:
Human beings, more than physical entities are spiritual beings as well. As we have seen sacred geometry throughout all of nature and within the physical body, it should be no surprise that there is sacred geometry surrounding the body, in the subtle realms of existence.

Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Human beings, more than physical entities are spiritual beings as well. As we have seen sacred geometry throughout all of nature and within the physical body, it should be no surprise that there is sacred geometry surrounding the body, in the subtle realms of existence.

title: Spirals
body:
Spirals are a unique form of geometry found throughout all of the cosmos.


Aside from some minor edits (and a new opening), we present this Flower of Life workshop, as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek himself, in its original condition from the DVD collection.
teaser: Spirals are a unique form of geometry found throughout all of the cosmos.

title: Dolphins and Whales
body: Could it be that the dolphins and whales that we are familiar with are not indigenous to planet Earth? Drunvalo Melchizedek reveals many mystical aspects of these magnificent creatures.
teaser: Could it be that the dolphins and whales that we are familiar with are not indigenous to planet Earth? Drunvalo Melchizedek reveals many mystical aspects of these magnificent creatures.

title: Binary Sequencing
body: There are two mathematical sequences that are vital to all of life on our planet, the Fibonacci sequence (which is female) and the Binary Sequence (which is male). Drunvalo Melchizedek the geometric constructs found in our world that are based upon the binary sequence.
teaser: There are two mathematical sequences that are vital to all of life on our planet, the Fibonacci sequence (which is female) and the Binary Sequence (which is male). Drunvalo Melchizedek the geometric constructs found in our world that are based upon the binary sequence.

title: Spirit and Sacred Geometry
body: We have seen the many ways that geometry shapes our physical world, so it should be no surprise that the subtle realms of the spiritual are also shaped by geometry.
teaser: We have seen the many ways that geometry shapes our physical world, so it should be no surprise that the subtle realms of the spiritual are also shaped by geometry.

title: The Emerald Tablets and Thoth's Story
body: The Emerald Tablets may be the greatest source of esoteric secrets for all of time, and its author is even more of a mystery. Drunvalo Melchizedek offers his personal experiences of the teachings of Thoth and the Emerald Tablets which have reached different parts of the world.
teaser: The Emerald Tablets may be the greatest source of esoteric secrets for all of time, and its author is even more of a mystery. Drunvalo Melchizedek offers his personal experiences of the teachings of Thoth and the Emerald Tablets which have reached different parts of the world.

title: Ancient Influences on our Modern World
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek portrays the placement of the structures on the Giza plateau, showing that they not only have a celestial alignment, but are arraigned within a golden spiral. Plus there are deeper mysteries to be explored underneath the Sphynx.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek portrays the placement of the structures on the Giza plateau, showing that they not only have a celestial alignment, but are arraigned within a golden spiral. Plus there are deeper mysteries to be explored underneath the Sphynx.

title: The Left Eye of Horus Mystery School
body: There were three mystery schools in ancient Egypt which correspond the eyes of Horus, left, right and middle. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains some of the teachings from the ancient mystery school known as the Left Eye of Horus.
teaser: There were three mystery schools in ancient Egypt which correspond the eyes of Horus, left, right and middle. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains some of the teachings from the ancient mystery school known as the Left Eye of Horus.

title: The Flower of Life seen from the Feminine Side Part 1
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek discusses the Flower of Life from the feminine side. As he builds from the genesis pattern to the fruit of life, we find that we can go within the geometry to discover holographic aspects of these geometric progressions.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek discusses the Flower of Life from the feminine side. As he builds from the genesis pattern to the fruit of life, we find that we can go within the geometry to discover holographic aspects of these geometric progressions.

title: The Flower of Life seen from the Feminine Side Part 2
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek continues his discussion of the Flower of Life from the feminine side. We gain an understanding of how this harmonic pattern is played out in the structure of light, music, thoughts and emotions.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek continues his discussion of the Flower of Life from the feminine side. We gain an understanding of how this harmonic pattern is played out in the structure of light, music, thoughts and emotions.

title: Estereograms
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek explains a different way that human beings can use their eyes and brain see things in a new way, using stereographic vision. We use this technique to view the strange 3D posters which reveal a hidden image when you learn how to train your eyes.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek explains a different way that human beings can use their eyes and brain see things in a new way, using stereographic vision. We use this technique to view the strange 3D posters which reveal a hidden image when you learn how to train your eyes.

title: Chakra Systems
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek introduces us to the human chakra systems. First, we look at the origin of the eight chakra system by comparing it to sound and music. Then we get into an expanded system with 13+ chakras.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek introduces us to the human chakra systems. First, we look at the origin of the eight chakra system by comparing it to sound and music. Then we get into an expanded system with 13+ chakras.

title: Duality Transcended
body: We perceive two primary forces in our reality, the light and dark. But this is just an interpretation from our polarized consciousness. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains how we can see beyond this apparent duality and understand how two opposing forces are actually working together.
teaser: We perceive two primary forces in our reality, the light and dark. But this is just an interpretation from our polarized consciousness. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains how we can see beyond this apparent duality and understand how two opposing forces are actually working together.

title: Crop Circles
body: Crop circles are found all over the world, not just in crops but in sand and snow. Their geometry indicates dimensions beyond our 3D world. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains that they are reflections of the sacred geometry that we have already explored.
teaser: Crop circles are found all over the world, not just in crops but in sand and snow. Their geometry indicates dimensions beyond our 3D world. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains that they are reflections of the sacred geometry that we have already explored.

title: Sun Pulsing
body: Strange movements of the Earth’s axis and pulsations in the sun were recording in ancient times. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains these changes continue into modern times and can affect all of life on our planet.
teaser: Strange movements of the Earth’s axis and pulsations in the sun were recording in ancient times. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains these changes continue into modern times and can affect all of life on our planet.

title: Governments on the Planet - The Secret Government
body: Some of the world’s the richest people trace their origins all the way back to Atlantis. Thus, they have positioned themselves to control all that goes on in the world. But as a planetary disaster looms, Drunvalo Melchizedek details the steps they are taking to form breakaway civilizations.
teaser: Some of the world’s the richest people trace their origins all the way back to Atlantis. Thus, they have positioned themselves to control all that goes on in the world. But as a planetary disaster looms, Drunvalo Melchizedek details the steps they are taking to form breakaway civilizations.

title: Places Where the Flower of Life has been Found
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek explores various places around the world where the flower of life image and other geometric forms which derivate from the flower have been found.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek explores various places around the world where the flower of life image and other geometric forms which derivate from the flower have been found.

title: 1972 the Sirian Experiment
body: Since ancient times, sacred sites have been be set up all over the world along a grid which needed to be completed by 1972, lest disaster befall our planet. It failed. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains how the Sirias took interest in our plight and offered a solution.
teaser: Since ancient times, sacred sites have been be set up all over the world along a grid which needed to be completed by 1972, lest disaster befall our planet. It failed. Drunvalo Melchizedek explains how the Sirias took interest in our plight and offered a solution.

title: Higher Self
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek reveals what the higher self is, its higher perspective of our lives, and how we can benefit from its wisdom.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek reveals what the higher self is, its higher perspective of our lives, and how we can benefit from its wisdom.

title: Love and Healing  Asking Permission to Higher Self Techniques Belief Patterns
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek discusses healing and making the transition to the higher levels. There are some very important things we need to know before making the transition into the higher dimensional levels.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek discusses healing and making the transition to the higher levels. There are some very important things we need to know before making the transition into the higher dimensional levels.

title: The End of Days 4th Dimension Fears
body: Drunvalo Melchizedek reveals the known signs and experiences during the very final moments when the poles shift and we make the transition into the 4th dimension.
teaser: Drunvalo Melchizedek reveals the known signs and experiences during the very final moments when the poles shift and we make the transition into the 4th dimension.

title: Final Questions
body: As we begin wrapping up the last episodes of the Flower of Life presentation, Drunvalo Melchizedek takes a final series of questions.
teaser: As we begin wrapping up the last episodes of the Flower of Life presentation, Drunvalo Melchizedek takes a final series of questions.

title: Drunvalo's Story
body: In this final installment, Drunvalo Melchizedek delves deeper into his past lives and the experiences which shaped him into the teacher he is today.
teaser: In this final installment, Drunvalo Melchizedek delves deeper into his past lives and the experiences which shaped him into the teacher he is today.
